ng-add.description: Adds NAE library to the project and creates all the necessary files.

create-nae-files.description: Creates all the necessary files for a NAE project

custom-themes.description: Generate a project custom themes from nae.json.

create-configuration-service.description: Generate a project specific configuration service and add the correct provider entry to app.module

create-view-service.description: Generate a project specific view service and add the correct provider entry to app.module

create-view.description: If nae.json contains views that were not created yet, creates one of them. Otherwise opens a prompt to input the settings.

create-view-prompt.description: Creates a view based on provided settings. Opens a prompt if no settings are provided.

create-sidenav-prompt.description: Adds extension to sidenav based on user inputs.
